title: Rek'Sai is the most well-designed champion in the game right now
body:
No sarcasm. She's both strong and easy to beat. She's mobile and immobile. She can be a tank or she can be a damage-dealer. Her tunnels are on a short cooldown and the cap is somewhat high, but I would have to say that is her only real flaw. Oh, and her low-cooldown knockup. BUT THAT'S IT.

Bravo, Riot.
